entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. Please state the reason for your call.
Yeah, hi. I want to return something. I bought it like, two weeks ago.
Okay, I can help with that. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Thank you, one moment while I pull up your order history. Okay, Sarah, I see your recent purchase. It looks like you purchased a VeloBand Pulse on the 5th of July. Is that correct?
Yes! The VeloBand Pulse. It's just not working out for me. I want to return it.
I understand. I can certainly look into that for you. Looking at our records, today is the 20th of July. I'm seeing that the purchase was made 15 days ago.
So? What's the problem? I don't want it!
Unfortunately, our return policy states that items must be returned within 10 days of the purchase date. I understand your frustration, but because it has been 15 days, a full refund is not possible.
Ten days?! Are you kidding me? I'm a loyal customer! I buy everything for my fitness from you guys! You're telling me I'm stuck with this useless VeloBand Pulse?

I understand your frustration, Sarah. Let me see if there's anything else I can do. While a full refund is outside of our return window, I can offer you store credit for the purchase amount. This will allow you to select another item from our catalog that better suits your needs. We have a new line of heart rate monitors, perhaps something there would be a better fit?
Store credit? So I can't just get my money back? This is ridiculous! I need the cash!

I understand your preference, Sarah. Unfortunately, because of the time elapsed, offering a full refund would be a policy exception that I am unable to authorize. However, the store credit allows you to get something else you truly want from our catalog. We are constantly adding new and exciting products.
Ugh, fine. I guess store credit is better than nothing. What's the process?

Great! I will issue the store credit to your account associated with sarah.miller@email.com. You should receive an email confirmation within the next few minutes containing the code. You can then use that code at checkout on your next purchase. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for at least doing *something* to help. I appreciate it.
You're welcome, Sarah. We appreciate your business with VeloFit. Have a great day!
